venue.address_1: Sand Hill Rd & Chief Ryan Way
venue.name: Pavilion at Nevers Park

item.description:
Paws in the Park is a day long event for both you and your dog,

being held at the Rotary Pavilion at Nevers Park on

Saturday, May 5th from 10am-3pm

The event is FREE to the public and all proceeds for this event

will benefit the Fidelco Guide Dog Foundation, Inc. and South

Windsor Bark Park.

There are many areas we will need help in.. as well a set up at 8am

and take down after 3pm.

 

Please post on your RSVP what hours you can make it.

If you can do the whole day like a few of us can that would

be greatly appreciated!!!
item.name: Paws in the Park
